short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save, organize, and manage highlights from any webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
HighlightME is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance your web browsing and research experience. With HighlightME, you can easily save, organize, and manage highlights from any webpage.
Key features:

Quick highlighting: Select text and save it with just a right-click or keyboard shortcut
Organize with tags: Add custom tags to your highlights for easy categorization
Search and filter: Quickly find your saved highlights using our robust search functionality
Sync across devices: Access your highlights from any device when signed in to Chrome
Star important highlights: Mark your most crucial highlights for quick access
Copy with source: Easily copy highlights with automatic source attribution

Whether you're a student, researcher, or just an avid reader, HighlightME helps you capture and retain important information from across the web.

 For any questions or changes you want to make email us: highlightme1848@gmal.com
